title: New forum meme, "baited".
body:
Whenever Riot calls out a troll on this forum, it is called "smiting". Sure, keep your "smite" memes. Let's add a new one though. "Baited". 

Whenever Riot responds to an obvious troll, we bring out the "baited" memes.

replies.body: What if I already had something going where I was baiting you to write a post about baiting?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=iB3EM48M,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-25T23:18:14.037+0000)
>
> What if I already had something going where I was baiting you to write a post about baiting?

Then you would be the Master...

And I'm not finishing that joke on the forums. :P
Damn. Now I feel like throwing a Tantram over this.
I'd wonder why you aren't working on the "honor" "system".
Let's make this a game. First poster to 5 successful baits wins. If you're smited then you're disqualified.
If you mean baiting by falsifying content or just plain shitposting, that isn't going to be tolerated, at least not on this board.

Smite bait is strong doe. All natural. Superfruit. Guaranteed to get you laid. 500% money back guarantee.

EDIT: Notice how the arbs are all up in this. :) Smite bait be that shit yo. One.

this is a poor idea and i hate memes
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
